sentences.en: As she sat in church her face had a pathos and poignancy.
sentences.cn: 当她坐在教堂里时,脸上带着一种哀婉和辛辣的表情.

sentences.en: He was the last of that generation and the poignancy of that is almost overwhelming.
sentences.cn: 他是那一辈人中最后一位幸存者,那些烽火年代的痛苦回忆令他几乎难以承受.

sentences.en: The film contains moments of almost unbearable poignancy.
sentences.cn: 电影中有几段几乎让人辛酸得不忍目睹。

sentences.en: The movie, " Trains, Planes, and Automobiles " treats this with hilarity and poignancy.
sentences.cn: 电影 “ 火车, 飞机和汽车 ” 是以欢娱和热情庆祝这个节日.

sentences.en: There is a certain poignancy about Eric.
sentences.cn: 埃里克的身上有一种哀伤。

words.tran_cn: 尖锐的；辛酸的；深刻的；切中要害的
深刻地；辛辣地；令人辛酸地

trans.tran_en: Poignancy is the quality that something has when it affects you deeply and makes you feel very sad
